protected_spaces_details.description: Provision for children and young people

description: Residential development of 76 units comprising 22x1 bedroom apartments, 34x2 bedroom apartments, 3x3 bedroom apartments, 15x3 bedroom dwelling houses and 2x4 bedroom dwelling houses with associated access, landscaping, local area for play, car parking and cycle parking.
